markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />Ineteract;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You throw the _sandstorm top_ 10 feet away from you. For 1 minute, as it spins, the top generates a magical sandstorm in a 5-foot radius. Any creature that starts its turn in the area or moves into the area takes 4d6 slashing damage (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). Additionally, a creature within the sandstorm must hold its breath or begin [suffocating](/Rules.aspx?ID=468).
name: Ineteract

For 1 minute, as it spins, the top generates a magical sandstorm in a 5-foot radius. Any creature that starts its turn in the area or moves into the area takes 4d6 slashing damage (DC 30 basic Reflex save).
